argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcbas.1 | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 2 |  | oppcid.2 | |- B = ( Id ` C ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_oppccatid | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( O e. Cat /\ ( Id ` O ) = ( Id ` C ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprd | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( Id ` O ) = ( Id ` C ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( Id ` O ) = B ) |
